title: Внуки в ауле
overview: Before his death, Zhanbyrbai ata, the elder of the village, a wayward and stubborn grandfather, bequeathed to his second cousins, who had never seen him in their lives, a house, a cow, the dog Aktos and 100 million tenge. The grandchildren will receive a huge inheritance under one condition - they need to live in the village for exactly a year, without leaving its territory for more than 24 hours. In case of an error, all money will be transferred to the account of the local akimat.
